mapper.select: SELECT space_id AS 'spaceId', space_name AS 'spaceName', scope_id AS 'scopeId', is_simple AS 'isSimple', is_enable AS 'isEnable', update_timestamp AS 'updateTimestamp' FROM todo_space_details INNER JOIN have_user_list ON todo_space_details.space_id = have_user_list.space_id WHERE have_user_list.user_id = #{userId} AND todo_space_details.scope_id = 1 AND todo_space_details.is_enable = 1
